Posts.Content: Dec 4, 2010 05:31PM Warrior67 wrote: Hi December Gals, Just wanted to post a note of encouragement from the other side.  I am eight weeks post-op from BMX (nipple sparing, Alloderm) with tissue expanders.  My expansion is done (exchange scheduled in February) and I am pretty much back to my normal activities.  I don't think the tissue expanders will ever be completely comfortable but they certainly feel "healed" at this point.  Give yourselves plenty of time to rest and recover.  I found it really helped to check in with my hubby on what progress and improvement he was seeing as I got very frustrated that "I wasn't getting better"  He said things like, you couldn't get out of bed by yourself two days ago.  Hmmm, true.   I am extremely pleased with how everything looks and haven't missed the boobs or regretted the surgery once.  I know not everyone has such a smooth ride but wanted to let you know that it is possible.  Best of luck with your journeys.  Wendy
